Literature.Title: A family of brevinin-2 peptides with potent activity against Pseudomonas aeruginosa from the skin of the Hokkaido frog, Rana pirica.
Literature.Author: Conlon JM, Sonnevend A, Patel M, Al-Dhaheri K, Nielsen PF, Kolodziejek J, Nowotny N, Iwamuro S, Pál T

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=3µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=6µM),Enterobacter cloacae NHTCC 53001(MIC=6µM),Klebsiella pneumoniae KK3 9904(MIC=12µM),Staphylococcus aureus NCTC 8325(MIC=25µM),Candida albicans ATCC 90028(MIC=100µM)
